participant_1.background:
I like to eat the food that my grandmother taught me to cook.
I have no siblings, but I'm hoping to learn some new tricks to teach my dog so we can have more adventures together!
My husband and I live on the outskirts of the city so we can afford a large home, but we still have access to all the city amenities.
i eat mainly chinese food.
I've been told my steaks are to die for.

participant_2.background:
I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
My panda mug is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of my favorite animal.
i am the oldest of three boys.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Not much, just listening to some music and relaxing.  How about you?
Same here, but I'm thinking about new things to try with my George Foreman grill.  What kind of music do you like?
I mostly listen to The Lumineers, but I like a variety of genres.  What do you cook on your grill?
I usually make steaks or chicken, but I'm thinking about trying something different.  Do you have any favorite recipes?
I'm not much of a cook, but I like to try new things.  Maybe we could exchange recipes sometime?
That would be fun!  I'd love to try some of your recipes.
Great!  I'll send you some of my favorites later.  What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.  He's the best dog in the world!
I love golden retrievers!  They're so friendly and loving.  What are some of your favorite things to do with Buddy?
I love taking him for walks in the park, and we go camping a lot in the summer.  He loves to swim.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm jealous!  I wish I had a dog.
They're great companions.  I'm glad I have Buddy.
I'm sure he's a great friend!  It sounds like you have a lot of fun together.
Yeah, we do.  He's the best!
